text: mago'a agri nagapinti vahe'ene vu'nazankino, ana vahe'mokizmi zamagi'a, Semaia'ma, Azareli'ma, Milalai'ma, Gilalai'ma, Ma'aima, Netaneli'ma, Juda'ene Hananiki hu'za vu'naze. Ana nehu'za Anumzamofo eri'za ne' Deviti'ma ahe'nea zavenaraminteti nehe'za, kasegema rempi hunezamia ne' Ezra ugota hige'za amefi vu'naze.
